thread.section_title: Totally Wicked E-liquid USA inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Totally Wicked E-liquid USA inc. | totallywicked-eliquid.com
thread.title: Ken
thread.title_full: Totally Wicked E-liquid USA inc. reviewed by Ken

author: Ken
title: Ken
text: There was a problem with my order and in two minutes on the phone TW CS dude had resolved it perfectly. This was a notable first for me with a vape vendor. My experience has been vape vendors not helping at all when a problem happens. To have Totally Wicked instantly offer to same day ship a replacement for my DOA item was exactly what I wanted but it blew me away that they did it. I had a working device in hand in 2 days. They've got my loyalty now..
